Package importedImplementations.NGA_MGRS.mgrs.mil.nga.sf.util.centroid

Class CentroidCurve

java.lang.Object
importedImplementations.NGA_MGRS.mgrs.mil.nga.sf.util.centroid.CentroidCurve
public class CentroidCurve extends Object
Calculate the centroid from curve based geometries. Implementation based on the JTS (Java Topology Suite) CentroidLine.
Since:
1.0.3
Author:
osbornb
